00025 Client::Client() {
00026         connected = false;

00034 // get sockaddr, IPv4 or IPv6:
00035 void *get_in_addr1(struct sockaddr *sa)
00036 {
00037     if (sa->sa_family == AF_INET) {
00038         return &(((struct sockaddr_in*)sa)->sin_addr);
00039     }
00040 
00041     return &(((struct sockaddr_in6*)sa)->sin6_addr);
00042 }
00043 
00044 bool Client::connection(string host,int port)
00045 {
00046     struct addrinfo hints, *servinfo, *p;
00047     int rv;
00048     char s[INET6_ADDRSTRLEN];
00049 
00050     memset(&hints, 0, sizeof hints);
00051     hints.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
00052     hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00053     string sport = boost::lexical_cast<string>(port);
00054     if ((rv = getaddrinfo(host.c_str(), sport.c_str(), &hints, &servinfo)) != 0) {
00055         fprintf(stderr, "getaddrinfo: %s\n", gai_strerror(rv));
00056         return false;
00057     }
00058 
00059     // loop through all the results and connect to the first we can
00060     for(p = servinfo; p != NULL; p = p->ai_next) {
00061         if ((sockfd = socket(p->ai_family, p->ai_socktype,
00062                 p->ai_protocol)) == -1) {
00063             perror("client: socket");
00064             continue;
00065         }
00066 
00067         if (connect(sockfd, p->ai_addr, p->ai_addrlen) == -1) {
00068             close(sockfd);
00069             perror("client: connect");
00070             continue;
00071         }
00072 
00073         break;
00074     }
00075 
00076     if (p == NULL) {
00077         fprintf(stderr, "client: failed to connect\n");
00078         return false;;
00079     }
00080 
00081     inet_ntop(p->ai_family, get_in_addr1((struct sockaddr *)p->ai_addr),
00082             s, sizeof s);
00083     printf("client: connecting to %s\n", s);
00084 
00085     freeaddrinfo(servinfo); // all done with this structure
00086 
00087     /*if ((numbytes = recv(sockfd, buf, MAXDATASIZE-1, 0)) == -1) {
00088         perror("recv");
00089         exit(1);
00090     }
00091 
00092     buf[numbytes] = '\0';
00093 
00094     printf("client: received '%s'\n",buf);
00095 
00096     close(sockfd);*/
00097     connected = true;
00098     return true;
00099 }

00101 int Client::sendData(string data)
00102 {
00103         int bytes = send(sockfd,data.c_str(),data.length(),0);
00104         if(bytes == -1)
00105         {
00106                 cout << "send failed" << flush;
00107         }
00108         return bytes;
00109 }
00110 
00111 string Client::getData()
00112 {
00113         int numbytes;
00114         char buf[MAXDATASIZE];
00115         if ((numbytes = recv(sockfd, buf, MAXDATASIZE-1, 0)) == -1)
00116         {
00117                 perror("recv");
00118                 string data;
00119                 return data;
00120                 //exit(1);
00121         }
00122         string data(buf,buf+numbytes);
00123         memset(&buf[0], 0, sizeof(buf));
00124         return data;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void Client::closeConnection()
00128 {
00129         close(sockfd);
00130 }
00131 
00132 bool Client::isConnected()
00133 {
00134         return connected;
00135 }
